PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-04532018-04-20,  ,  ,  ,  PCH
ActNational Capital Act
SubjectLease with Kaliyana Artwear Inc. ** NCC **
PrecisOrder authorizing the NATIONAL CAPITAL COMMISSION to grant one option of five years, commencing on December 1, 2018, to renew an existing five-year lease with KALIYANA ARTWEAR INC., to occupy third floor office space at a property located at 6 & 8 York Street, in Ottawa.
AttachmentsAttachment
